summary: This is my remake of Onmund. I've always really liked Onmund because of his background and personality, but always thought his face needed some major improvement. I really like what I've done to him so treat him well!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Onmund by CrimsonFairy[/size][/color][/font]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Description[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
My remake of Onmund! I've always really liked Onmund because of his background and personality, but always thought his face needed some major improvement. I really like what I've done to him so treat him well! This mod only replaces Onmund's look, I didn't touch anything else like stats etc.

Please let me know if you have any problems with him. I'll try my best to help resolve any issues.

As of now there are two preset versions of Onmund, as requested. One version includes his warpaint while the other one doesn't. You cannot take the warpaint off of the warpaint version but you can add other warpaint to it. His unique eye texture was not included in the preset file because I do not have permission to make the eyes playable for every race. You'll just have to download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]High Quality Eyes by Xenius[/url] if you want his eye texture. The presets have only been tested by me and I have not tested them a lot, so there may be some problems that I'm not aware of.

Special thanks to Greyblood for testing my mod and taking screenshots.

I hope you all like him! Enjoy! :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Requirements[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The male standalone version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]. It looks like this ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0      Anything newer than this should work as well.

Nothing earlier than the 1.8 Skyrim patch. The 1.9 patch should be compatible too.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Recommended[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

To get the look in the screens I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Younger Faces Merged With Men By Geonox[/url]. And I also used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Install/Uninstall[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. Click yes to all. It shouldn't ask you to overwrite anything. Activate esp. And that's it! If you use UFO then I think you're supposed to load follower mods under the UFO.esp in order for UFO changes to affect them.

Go to Data and delete Onmund.esp. Then go to Data/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/skyrim.esm and delete 0001c194. And then go to Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/FaceTint/skyrim.esm and delete 0001c194. Then go back to the Data/Textures/actors/character/ folder and open up the eyes folder and delete CFOnmund.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Credits[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for making Skyrim.
Xenius for kindly letting me include one of his High Quality Eyes texture's in my mod.
Apachii for her amazing ApachiiSkyHair mod and for letting me use it.
Greyblood for testing and taking screenshots.
Creation Kit.
Skyrim NPC Editor.
And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome work and website.
Please let me know if I forgot someone! I'm pretty sure I got them all though.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Usage/Permission[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
If you want to do something with my mod (as in, translating or uploading it somewhere) then you'll have to get permission from me first. If I give you my permission then you'll be directed to a couple other people you'll have to get permission from as well.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Bugs[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Some people have reported that Onmund's hair shows up blue/purple but I don't know why, so I don't know how to fix this. One person did say that reinstalling Apachii Sky Hair fixed the issue. Another person said that having an extra Skyrim Data folder in the Skyrim common folder caused the problem, and that deleting the extra folder made the blue hair go away. I don't know of any more problems, but please let me know if you find any! Just to be on the safe side, after uninstalling my mod, load a save game where Onmund isn't in the same cell, just to be safe. Do the same when installing the mod too just to make sure it loads correctly.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Other follower mods by me[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30894]Belrand Remake[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28862]Azalea Follower[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32564]Talvas Fathryon Remake[/url].
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41919/?]Dimitri Follower[/url].

Thanks for reading, downloading, commenting and endorsing! :)
author: CrimsonFairy
